## install pkg

```{r}
# remotes::install_github("rstudio/thematic")
library(thematic)
```



```{r}
library(thematic)
thematic_on(
  bg = "#222222", fg = "white", accent = "#0CE3AC",
  font = "auto"
)
```



```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
```

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_smooth(color = "white")
```
